about.text:
Hi, I'm Radek and I welcome you to the SmallFishBusiness.com blog! Here
        you will find articles on the most important issues related to running a
        small business: marketing, public relations, management and IT. We hope
        that thanks to us you will save yourself a lot of trouble, time and
        money, and that running a business will become easier.

homePage.title: Smallfisbusiness | Blog for small business | Main Page
homePage.description: Smart tips for small business growth
